docs.text: Compositions A package to introduce composable structures in python. Installation pip install Compositions Git Repository . Usage from compositions.compositions import Compose # Declare a composable function @Compose def f(x): return x # Declare a composable function @Compose def g(x): return x**2 + x**3 print(g(3)) print(f(4)) # f(g(x)) print( (g*f)(3) )
docs.title: Compositions
